query.title: Airbus Subsidies
query.desc: Document will discuss government assistance to Airbus Industrie, or mention a trade dispute between Airbus and a U.S. aircraft producer over the issue of subsidies.

query.title: South African Sanctions
query.desc: Document discusses sanctions against South Africa.

query.title: Leveraged Buyouts
query.desc: Document mentions a leveraged buyout valued at or above 200 million dollars.

query.title: Satellite Launch Contracts
query.desc: Document will cite the signing of a contract or preliminary agreement, or the making of a tentative reservation, to launch a commercial satellite.

query.title: Insider Trading
query.desc: Document discusses an insider-trading case.

query.title: Prime (Lending) Rate Moves, Predictions
query.desc: Document will include a prediction about the prime lending rate, or will report an actual prime rate move.

query.title: MCI
query.desc: Document will discuss how MCI has been doing since the Bell System breakup.

query.title: Rail Strikes
query.desc: Document will predict or anticipate a rail strike or report an ongoing rail strike.

query.title: Weather Related Fatalities
query.desc: Document will report a type of weather event which has directly caused at least one fatality in some location.

query.title: Merit-Pay vs. Seniority
query.desc: Document will describe either one or both sides of the controversy over the use of standards of performance to determine salary levels and incentive pay as contrasted with determining pay solely on the basis of seniority or longevity on the job.

query.title: Israeli Role in Iran-Contra Affair
query.desc: Document will discuss the role of Israel in the Iran-Contra Affair.

query.title: Military Coups D'etat
query.desc: Document will report a military coup d'etat, either attempted or successful, in any country.

query.title: Machine Translation
query.desc: Document will identify a machine translation system.

query.title: Hostage-Taking
query.desc: Document will report an event or result of politically motivated hostage-taking.

query.title: Information Retrieval Systems
query.desc: Document will identify a type of information retrieval system.

query.title: Natural Language Processing
query.desc: Document will identify a type of natural language processing technology which is being developed or marketed in the U.S.

query.title: Politically Motivated Civil Disturbances
query.desc: Document will report a current civil disturbance in any country, involving citizens of that country protesting a political position of their own country's government.

query.title: Health Hazards from Fine-Diameter Fibers
query.desc: Document will report actual studies, or even unsubstantiated concerns about the safety to manufacturing employees and installation workers of fine-diameter fibers used in insulation and other products.

query.title: Attempts to Revive the SALT II Treaty
query.desc: Document will report an attempt by the U.S. House of Representatives or a European country to revive the SALT II Treaty ceilings on weapons in order to limit President Reagan's military build up.

query.title: Surrogate Motherhood
query.desc: Document will report judicial proceedings and opinions on contracts for surrogate motherhood.

query.title: Border Incursions
query.desc: Document will report incursions by land, air, or water into the border area of one country by military forces of a second country or a guerrilla group based in a second country.

query.title: Demographic Shifts in the U.S.
query.desc: Document will report a movement of people from one area of the U.S. to another for a variety of reasons. The movement of population described should be large enough to have some economic impact.

query.title: Demographic Shifts across National Boundaries
query.desc: Document will report a movement of people from one country to another for a variety of reasons. The movement of population described should be large enough to have some economic impact.

query.title: Conflicting Policy
query.desc: Document will cite an instance in which the U.S. government propounds two conflicting or opposing policies.

query.title: Automation
query.desc: Document will identify an instance in which automation has clearly paid off, or conversely, has failed.

query.title: U.S. Constitution - Original Intent
query.desc: Document will include a discussion of, or debate over, the issue of the original intent of the U.S. Constitution, or the meaning of a particular amendment to the Constitution, or will present an individual's interpretation of an amendment.

query.title: Poaching
query.desc: Document will report a poaching method used against a certain type of wildlife.

query.title: Greenpeace
query.desc: Document will report activity by Greenpeace to carry out their environmental protection goals.

query.title: FRG Political Party Positions
query.desc: Document will identify at least one German political party and report some position which the party has taken in regard to a political, social, economic, military, environmental, or international objective.
query.NounePhrase: least one German political party and report
political , social , economic , military , environmental , or international objective

query.title: 1988 Presidential Candidates Platforms
query.desc: Document will identify something about the platform of a 1988 presidential candidate.

query.title: Financial crunch for televangelists in the wake of the PTL
query.desc: Document will report a loss of revenue of a televangelist in the aftermath of the PTL scandal, or a financial crisis triggered by the scandal.

query.title: Genetic Engineering
query.desc: Document discusses a genetic engineering application, a product that has been, is being, or will be developed by genetic manipulation, or attitudes toward genetic engineering.

query.title: Measures to Protect the Atmosphere
query.desc: Document will discuss plans, projects, agreements, treaties, or laws concluded or under consideration aimed at protecting the atmosphere.
query.NounePhrase: plans , projects , agreements , treaties , or laws

query.title: Alternative/renewable Energy Plant & Equipment Installation
query.desc: Document will identify planned or under-construction alternative/renewable energy plant or equipment installations.
query.NounePhrase: renewable energy plant or equipment installations

query.title: Official Corruption
query.desc: Document will discuss allegations, or measures being taken against, corrupt public officials of any governmental jurisdiction worldwide.

query.title: Bank Failures
query.desc: Document will identify recent bank failures within the United States, specifying name, location, assets, and federal or state authorities taking action.
query.NounePhrase: United States , specifying name , location , assets , and federal or state authorities taking action

query.title: Criminal Actions Against Officers of Failed
query.desc: Document will report on current criminal actions against officers of a failed U.S. financial institution.

query.title: Crude Oil Price Trends
query.desc: Document will provide quantitative data usable in charting international crude oil price trends.
query.NounePhrase: charting international crude oil price trends

query.title: "Downstream" Investments by OPEC Member States
query.desc: Document must identify an existing or pending investment by an OPEC member state in any "downstream" operation.

query.title: Data on Proven Reserves of Oil & Natural Gas
query.desc: Document will provide totals or specific data on changes to the proven reserve figures for any oil or natural gas producer.

query.title: U.S. Army Acquisition of Advanced Weapons Systems
query.desc: Document will identify acquisition by the U.S. Army of specified advanced weapons systems.

query.title: International Military Equipment Sales
query.desc: Document will identify a proposed or recently concluded sale of military equipment in the international arms market.

query.title: What Backing Does the National Rifle Association
query.desc: Document must describe or identify supporters of the National Rifle Association (NRA), or its assets.

query.title: Computer-aided Crime
query.desc: Document must identify a crime perpetrated with the aid of a computer.

query.title: Computer-aided Crime Detection
query.desc: Document must describe a computer application to crime solving.

query.title: Computer-Aided Medical Diagnosis
query.desc: Document must describe computer programs, or computerized equipment, which aid in medical diagnosis.

query.title: Fiber Optics Applications
query.desc: Document must identify instances of fiber optics technology actually in use.

query.title: Fiber Optics Equipment Manufacturers
query.desc: Document must identify individuals or organizations which produce fiber optics equipment.

query.title: Iran-Contra Affair
query.desc: Document will identify a development in the Iran-Contra Affair.

query.title: Controlling the Transfer of High Technology
query.desc: Document will identify efforts by the non-communist, industrialized states to regulate the transfer of high-tech goods or "dual-use" technologies to undesirable nations.

query.title: Design of the "Star Wars" Anti-missile Defense System
query.desc: Document will provide information on the proposed configuration, components, and technology of the U.S.'s "star wars" anti-missile defense system.

query.title: Laser Research Applicable to the U.S.'s Strategic Defense
query.desc: Document will report on laser research related, or potentially related, to the U.S.'s Strategic Defense Initiative.

query.title: Welfare Reform
query.desc: Document will report those proposed or enacted changes to U.S. federal, state, or local welfare laws and regulations which are propounded as reforms.

query.title: Catastrophic Health Insurance
query.desc: Document will enumerate provisions of the U.S. Catastrophic Health Insurance Act of l988, or the political/legal fallout from that legislation.

query.title: "Black Monday"
query.desc: Document will state reasons why U.S. stock markets crashed on 19 October 1987 ("Black Monday"), or report on attempts to guard against another such crash.

query.title: U.S. Control of Insider Trading
query.desc: Document will report proposed or enacted changes to U.S. laws and regulations designed to prevent insider trading.

query.title: Japanese Regulation of Insider Trading
query.desc: Document will inform on Japan's regulation of insider trading.

query.title: Japanese Protectionist Measures
query.desc: Document will report on Japanese policies or practices which help protect Japan's domestic market from foreign competition.

query.title: Find Innovative Companies
query.desc: Document must refer to one of the following: OTC Ltd., Hi Tech Enterprises, Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing, Integrated Solutions Inc., MIPS Computer Systems Inc., or Ask Computer Systems Inc.
query.NounePhrase: Tech Enterprises , Minnesota Mining and Manufacturing , Integrated Solutions Inc. , MIPS Computer Systems Inc.

query.title: Black Resistance Against the South African Government
query.desc: Document will discuss efforts by the black majority in South Africa to overthrow domination by the white minority government.

query.title: Nuclear Proliferation
query.desc: Document will discuss efforts by the United Nations or those nations currently possessing nuclear weapons to control the proliferation of nuclear weapons capabilities to the non-nuclear weapons states.

query.title: Funding Biotechnology
query.desc: Document will provide financial data relative to answering the question, how much money worldwide is being invested in the biotechnology arena?

query.title: New Space Satellite Applications
query.desc: Document will report on non-traditional applications of space satellite technology.

query.title: Non-commercial Satellite Launches
query.desc: Document will provide data on launches worldwide of non-commercial space satellites.

query.title: Impact of the 1986 Immigration Law
query.desc: Document will report specific consequence(s) of the U.S.'s Immigration Reform and Control Act of 1986.

query.title: Generic Drug Substitutions
query.desc: Document will identify a generic drug which can be substituted for a brand name drug in the treatment of at least one medical condition.

query.title: Capacity of the U.S. Cellular Telephone Network
query.desc: Document will provide at least one datum which helps build a description, quantification, and evaluation of the capacity of the U.S. cellular telephone network.

query.title: International Terrorists
query.desc: Document will provide background information on international terrorist groups or individuals, or detail the activities of such groups or individuals.
query.NounePhrase: international terrorist groups or individuals , or detail

query.title: Actions Against International Terrorists
query.desc: Document will report activities by established political authorities against international terrorists.

query.title: Economic Impact of International Terrorism
query.desc: Document will report on actual or alleged private sector economic consequences of international terrorism.

query.title: Death from Cancer
query.desc: Document will discuss the life and death of a prominent U.S. person from a specific form of cancer.

query.title: RDT&E of New Cancer Fighting Drugs
query.desc: Document will report on the research, development, testing, and evaluation (RDT&E) of a new anti-cancer drug developed anywhere in the world.

query.title: Research into & Control of Carcinogens
query.desc: Document will report on studies into linkages between environmental factors or chemicals which might cause cancer, and/or it will report on governmental actions to identify, control, or limit exposure to those factors or chemicals which have been shown to be carcinogenic.

query.title: Alternatives to Traditional Cancer Therapies
query.desc: Document will report on innovative approaches to preventing or curing cancer.

query.title: Anti-smoking Actions by Government
query.desc: Document will describe actions by public authorities to limit the human use of tobacco.

query.title: Medical Ethics and Modern Technology
query.desc: Document will discuss ethical issues attendant to contemporary advances in medical technology.

query.title: U.S.-U.S.S.R. Arms Control Agreements
query.desc: Document will report the terms of arms control agreements concluded, under negotiation, or proposed between the United States and the Soviet Union.

query.title: Privatization of State Assets
query.desc: Document discusses a current or future sale to the private sector, by a government or government entity, of a business, businesses, or shares of a business owned by the state.

query.title: Soviet Spying on the U.S.
query.desc: Document will report spying by the USSR within U.S. territory or against U.S. interests overseas.

query.title: Jewish Emigration and U.S.-USSR Relations
query.desc: Document will report on the issue of Jewish emigration from the Soviet Union as it impacts on U.S.-Soviet relations.

query.title: McDonnell Douglas Contracts for Military Aircraft
query.desc: Document will identify and quantify a contract awarded to McDonnell Douglas for production of military aircraft.

query.title: "Stealth" Aircraft
query.desc: Document will provide cost, technical, and/or performance data on U.S. "stealth" aircraft projects.

query.title: Hubble Space Telescope
query.desc: Document will describe some design feature of the Hubble Space Telescope.

query.title: The Human Genome Project
query.desc: Document will report on the objectives, processes, and organization of the human genome project.

query.title: Possible Contributions of Gene Mapping to Medicine
query.desc: Document will report on efforts to locate and describe genes linked to inherited human diseases and/or report on the potential medical contributions such information might yield.

query.title: Diversification by Pacific Telesis
query.desc: Document will report on attempts by Pacific Telesis to diversify beyond its basic business of providing local telephone service.

query.title: Expansion in the U.S. Theme Park Industry
query.desc: Document will report on the building of a new or on the expansion/upgrade of an existing theme park by a U.S. corporation in the United States or overseas.

query.title: Iranian Support for Lebanese Hostage-takers
query.desc: Document will give data linking Iran to groups in Lebanon which seize and hold Western hostages.

query.title: Iran's Islamic Revolution - Domestic and Foreign Social
query.desc: Document will report on the religious, legal, cultural, and social consequences of Iran's Islamic Revolution within Iran and abroad.
query.NounePhrase: religious , legal , cultural , and social consequences

query.title: Political Impact of Islamic Fundamentalism
query.desc: Document will report on the political impact of Islamic fundamentalism within any nation other than Iran.

query.title: Japan's Handling of its Trade Surplus with the U.S.
query.desc: Document will report on Japanese efforts to deal with U.S. complaints regarding Japan's surplus in bilateral trade.

query.title: Impact of Government Regulated Grain Farming on International
query.desc: Document will show how and why national governments supervise and protect their own growers of grain and/or how these policies impact a nation's foreign trade and diplomatic relations.
query.NounePhrase: nation 's foreign trade and diplomatic relations

query.title: Why Protect U.S. Farmers?
query.desc: Document will contribute to an analysis of how and why, and at what cost, the U.S. federal government protects, supports, and controls U.S. farming.

query.title: Management Problems at the United Nations
query.desc: Document will report on alleged corruption, incompetence, or inefficiency in the management of the United Nation's staff, activities, or specialized agencies.
query.NounePhrase: United Nation 's staff , activities , or specialized agencies

query.title: Influence of the "Pro-Israel Lobby"
query.desc: Document will describe how, and how effectively, the so-called "pro-Israel lobby" operates in the United States.

query.title: Negotiating an End to the Nicaraguan Civil War
query.desc: Document will report on the negotiating process leading to an end to the Nicaraguan civil war.

query.title: Productivity Trends in the U.S. Economy
query.desc: Document will provide productivity statistics on the U.S. economy.

query.title: Conflict in the Horn of Africa
query.desc: Document will report on the Ethiopia-Somalia War, civil wars within those nations, and/or the movement of refugees fleeing armed conflicts between or within Ethiopia and Somalia.

query.title: Industrial Espionage
query.desc: Document will report on industrial espionage.

query.title: U.S. Political Campaign Financing
query.desc: Document will report how U.S. politicians finance their election campaigns and/or moves to "reform" campaign finance practices.

query.title: Coping with overcrowded prisons
query.desc: The document will provide information on jail and prison overcrowding and how inmates are forced to cope with those conditions; or it will reveal plans to relieve the overcrowded condition.

query.title: Accusations of Cheating by Contractors on U.S. Defense Projects
query.desc: Document will refer to an alleged illegality committed by any entity seeking a contract on behalf of the U.S. Military Forces.

query.title: Insurance Coverage which pays for Long Term Care
query.desc: Document will discuss insurance coverage for long term care confinements.

query.title: Oil Spills
query.desc: Document will identify major oil spills throughout the world.

query.title: Right Wing Christian Fundamentalism in U.S.
query.desc: Document will discuss implications of the decision of Right Wing Christian Fundamentalist Groups to use the political process to further their goals.

query.title: Efforts to enact Gun Control Legislation
query.desc: Documents will relate to efforts to enact Gun Control Legislation. They may also discuss implication upon and interpretation of the Second Amendment to the U.S. Constitution as it relates to these efforts.

query.title: Causes and treatments of multiple sclerosis (MS)
query.desc: Documents will focus on studies as to causes of multiple sclerosis and on research efforts to develop treatments and/or cures for it.

query.title: Term limitations for members of the U.S. Congress
query.desc: Documents will relate the issues involved in these controversial proposals to try to place limits on the number of terms members of Congress can serve consecutively.

query.title: Electric Car Development
query.desc: A relevant document will provide information on work already done, or being done, to develop an electric car.

query.title: Vitamins - The Cure for or Cause of
query.desc: Document will identify vitamins that have contributed to the cure for human diseases or ailments or documents will identify vitamins that have caused health problems in humans.
query.NounePhrase: human diseases or ailments or documents

query.title: Acid Rain
query.desc: Document will provide information on the problems and actions associated with what is known as acid rain.

query.title: Automobile Recalls
query.desc: Document will provide data that expands on the type and purpose of recalls on vehicles manufactured by American or Foreign automobile companies.

query.title: Vietnam Veterans and Agent Orange
query.desc: While serving in South Vietnam, a number of U.S. Soldiers were reported as having been exposed to the defoliant Agent Orange. The issue is veterans entitlement, or the awarding of monetary compensation and/or medical assistance for physical damages caused by Agent Orange.

query.title: Generic Drugs - Illegal Activities by Manufacturers
query.desc: Document will report FDA or Congressional investigations concerning illegal activities by generic drug manufacturers.

query.title: Tobacco company advertising and the young
query.desc: A document will provide information on what is a widely held opinion that the tobacco industry aims its advertising at the young.

query.title: Standardized testing and cultural bias
query.desc: A document must provide information on charges that standardized testing of applicants to the college level is biased against racial minorities, women, and the poor.

query.title: Regulation of the showing of violence and explicit
query.desc: A relevant document must report on efforts taken in the USA or abroad to regulate in any way the portrayal of violence and sex scenes in the movies, on television or videos.

query.title: Financing AMTRAK
query.desc: A document will address the role of the Federal Government in financing the operation of the National Railroad Transportation Corporation (AMTRAK).

query.title: Cost of Garbage/Trash Removal
query.desc: Document will report problems with garbage or trash removal and identify a related cost figure for a household or government entity (local, state, or federal).

query.title: The Consequences of Implantation of Silicone Gel
query.desc: Document will discuss the use of silicone gel breast implants manufactured by Dow-Corning Corporation and recipient`s concerns regarding future medical problems that may occur as a result of manufacturing defects or lack of proper testing before approval for general public use.

query.title: Use of Mutual Funds in an Individual's
query.desc: Document will discuss the role of mutual funds as an investment alternative in formulating an individual's retirement program.

query.title: The Effectiveness of Medical Products and
query.desc: Document will identify the effectiveness of the use of medical products and related psychological/psychiatric services in the cessation of smoking.

query.title: Smoking Bans
query.desc: Document will provide data on smoking bans initiated worldwide in the public and private sector workplace, on various modes of public transportation, and in commercial advertising.

query.title: Hazardous Waste Cleanup
query.desc: Document will provide data on the Comprehensive Environmental Response, Compensation, and Liability Act known as the Superfund Hazardous Waste Cleanup Program.
query.NounePhrase: Comprehensive Environmental Response , Compensation , and Liability Act

query.title: NRA Prevention of Gun Control Legislation
query.desc: Document will report occasions on which the NRA engaged in actions which prevented the passage of legislation designed to reduce the proliferation of guns.

query.title: Real-life private investigators
query.desc: Document must refer to the hiring of a private investigator in real-life or describe the work of a private investigator.

query.title: English as the Official Language in U.S.
query.desc: Document will provide arguments supporting the making of English the standard language of the U.S.

query.title: Dog Maulings
query.desc: Document will report on attacks by dogs on humans in the U.S.

query.title: U. S. Restaurants in Foreign Lands
query.desc: Document will identify those countries where U.S. fast food restaurant chains are now or will be located.

query.title: Ineffectiveness of U.S. Embargoes/Sanctions
query.desc: Document will report ineffective results of embargo/sanction activities against a foreign nation by the U.S. Embargo may be established in conjunction with friendly nation(s) after notification to the U.N.

query.title: Abuse of the Elderly by Family Members, and Medical and
query.desc: Document will identify reports of elderly patients being abused in nursing homes and other facilities by skilled medical and nonmedical personnel and family members.
query.NounePhrase: skilled medical and nonmedical personnel and family members

query.title: Commercial Overfishing Creates Food Fish Deficit
query.desc: Document will provide information that the world's food fish population is decreasing due to commercial overfishing, and should present information for the need for counteractive measures.

query.title: Asbestos Related Lawsuits
query.desc: Document will report on asbestos related lawsuits concerning asbestosis, a chronic disease of the lungs or mesothelioma, an incurable cancer of the chest and abdominal membranes.

query.title: Corporate Pension Plans/Funds
query.desc: Document will report on problems associated with pension plans/funds such as fraud, skimming, tapping or raiding.

query.title: Reform of the U.S. Welfare System
query.desc: Document will report on reform of welfare system in the U.S. at the federal, state or local levels of government.

query.title: Difference of Learning Levels Among Inner
query.desc: Document should report the actual or alleged difference in educational learning levels among inner city and other public school students.
query.NounePhrase: inner city and other public school students

query.title: Signs of the Demise of Independent Publishing
query.desc: Document must identify instances of the loss of independence by publishers, from the sale or merger of their business or publication, or the sale of a significant interest in it to another person or company.

query.title: Beachfront Erosion
query.desc: Document will identify instances of beach erosion anywhere in the U.S. and what, if anything, is being done to prevent its repetition.

query.title: Real Motives for Murder
query.desc: Document must identify a murderer's motive for killing a person or persons in a true case.

query.title: Instances of Fraud Involving the Use of a Computer
query.desc: Document will report instances of fraud accomplished anywhere in the world through the use of an electronic computer.

query.title: Efforts to Improve U.S. Schooling
query.desc: Documents will report an attempt or idea within the U.S. to improve student performance at any level (K through post-graduate) by any means (teacher pay, new equipment, new methods, new incentives, etc.).

query.title: Oil Spill Cleanup
query.desc: chemical used in cleaning up oil spills such as the Exxon Valdez. Only oil spills on water (ocean, bay, lake, etc.) will be used.

query.title: Toys R Dangerous
query.desc: to children and the activities by consumer safety groups and parents against production and retail of these dangerous toys.

query.title: The Amount of Money Earned by Writers
query.desc: Document must quote amount of money earned by writers as a result of their writing efforts.

query.title: Stock Market Perturbations Attributable to
query.desc: negative instances of stock market shifts primarily owing to computer assisted trading initiatives.

query.title: School Choice Voucher System and its effects
query.desc: positive or negative, of a proposed or actual government financed voucher system for elementary and secondary students enabling them to attend the school of their choice.
query.NounePhrase: proposed or actual government financed voucher system

query.title: Reform of the jurisprudence system
query.desc: reform (a civil wrong for which the injured party seeks a judgement) with regard to placing limitations on monetary compensation to plaintiffs.

query.title: Gene Therapy and Its Benefits to
query.desc: in medical science which enable researchers to alter genes thereby effecting a cure or stabilizing a person`s medical condition or illness.

query.title: Legality of Medically Assisted Suicides
query.desc: is effected through the assistance of a medically competent person -- doctor, nurse, medical technician etc. -- and the legality of such an assisted action.

query.title: Impact of foreign textile imports on U.S.
query.desc: of foreign textiles or textile products has influenced or impacted on the U.S. textile industry.
